title: Tired and thirsty 又累又渴
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question. Why do the children thank their mother?
听录音，然后回答问题。为什么孩子们向母亲致谢?

text_and_translation.text: MOTHER: Are you all right now?
text_and_translation.translation: 母亲：你们现在好些了吗？

text_and_translation.text: MOTHER: Look! There's an ice cream man.
text_and_translation.translation: 母亲：看！有个卖冰淇淋的。

text_and_translation.text: GIRL: These ice creams are nice.
text_and_translation.translation: 女孩：这些冰淇淋真好吃。

text_and_translation.text: MOTHER: Are you all right now?
CHILDREN: Yes, we are, thank you!
text_and_translation.translation: 孩子们：是的，现在好了，谢谢您！

notes.title: What's the matter?
notes.describe: 询问某人有什么问题或怎么了。

notes.title: tired and thirsty
notes.describe: 表达累和渴的状态，通常用来描述需要休息和饮水的情况。

notes.title: Thanks, Mum.
notes.describe: 感谢的表达方式，用于对母亲表示感谢。
